Blackbox Connect Graduates

We help promising non-US startups interface with Silicon Valley and scale globally.
Already 77 startup founders from 25 different countries attended Blackbox Connect.


6th class, October 2013 (16 participants)

Ricardo Dorado Chile

Co-founder of Benchbanking. Executive with a strong track record of international business leadership in telecom-internet-media and retail companies. CXOs contact across them in Latin America and Europe. More than 10 years of experience building and leading cross-functional teams in product marketing & management, business development, sales and technology, in both, start-up and corporate companies.

Matías Fontecilla Chile

Co-Founder and Chief Commercial Officer in BenchBanking leading every aspect of sales, account management and user experience. At age 18, he created a marketplace for exotic animal exchange between zoos. He studied Business, then worked in Chilean Central Bank, The Nielsen Company and FASA before returning to his entrepreneurial roots by founding a Marketing and Strategy Consulting firm.

Alex Bartzis Australia

Alex is the co-founder of Cookoo with a dynamic and enthusiastic passion to design innovative solutions for the everyday person. He is a lover of food, protein and staying very active which has provided him with the vision for Cookoo. He believes in success through the user interface and has been responsible for the development of the look and feel of Cookoo.

Raj Prasad Australia

Raj Prasad is the co-founder of Cookoo, an entrepreneur with a passion for food and innovation; Raj’s career spans from expertise in M&A transactions to restructuring advice. MBA holder, his skills in business model innovation and strategy coupled with a creative business mind has made him a valuable member of the Cookoo team.

Chalermyuth Boonma Thailand

Co-founder of Fastinflow. A visionary digital marketer! Keen on digital marketing, social media marketing, and also passionate about building something that could influence the way people live. He experienced working with successful brands, advertising companies and tech startups including Ensogo (Livingsocial) and Zalora (Rocket Internet). He had also been heavily involved building the Thailand tech startup ecosystem.

Jakkarin Pipopkullaporn Thailand

Co-founder of Fastinflow. A strategic thinker who loves numbers! Passionate about startups and new business opportunities. Currently, he is especially interested in digital products as they make people live a better life. He led Polymer R team and won first runner up in MAI business plan competition. He got his first degree with honours in BBA Finance.

Santiago Fossatti Argentina

Associate at Kaszek Ventures, Latin America’s leading Venture Capital firm. As Kaszek’s first employee, focused on sourcing new deals for the fund, Santiago has participated in 40 investments rounds for over $400M. Santiago was previously an associate at Value Partners where he worked in several engagements for leading telco industries. Santiago got an Industrial Engineering degree.

Daniel Scandian Brazil

Co-founder and CEO of MadeiraMadeira, Brazil’s leading home improvement online retailer backed by Kaszek Ventures, Monashees and Flybridge. Before founding MadeiraMadeira, Daniel was the R&D director for Novopiso, a leading flooring company in Brazil. Daniel holds a B.S. in Production Engineering and also was a professional Racing Driver.

Philippe Lebeau France

Co-founder of Mobisystème. He brings nearly 25 years of experience in designing marketing campaigns with impact. Philippe combined his penchant for outdoor sports and entrepreneurial spirit to create Aerocom, an advertising agency for the best suppliers of mountaineering and outdoor sports gear in Europe. He also managed the adoption of Annecy on the shortlist of cities to host the 2018 Winter Olympics.

Richard Phan France

Co-founder of Mobisystème. Richard Phan was Program Director at Palm, where he lead worldwide 3G smartphone R&D programs. Prior to this, Richard spent 7 years in Silicon Valley, working for HP and Handspring in R&D, manufacturing, and operations. Richard holds an Engineering degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, and has a very rich multicultural background.

Cosmin Ciobanu Romania

CEO & Founder of Octonius, enthusiast entrepreneur and UX creator. With a background of mobile UX & UI design, data privacy & security, he specialized in GTDs, productivity systems and workflows. Very focused on simplicity design. He is a renaissance man, with a passion for history of arts, hiking and climbing.

Cristian Ivan Romania

CTO & Co-founder of Octonius, iOS developer and UX expert. Pixel perfect enthusiast. An IT polymath with a background from the humble beginnings of the UNIX to the core of the iOS platform.

Arjun Pillai India

Co-founder, CEO & Hustler @Vibe, Undergraduate in Electronics and Communication. He's been Systems Engineer for 2 years as an SAP Developer. Arjun is a management aspirant. He is proactive, loves to build teams and sustain them. His role is to drive the business operations of Vibe. Good communication, presentation and oratory skills add up his relevance to the team.

Jofin Joseph India

Co-founder, COO @Vibe, Jofin is an undergraduate in Computer Science and Engineering. His areas of experience include enterprise systems, business analytics software and business process management systems. He founded a startup called Openode Labs along with his college mates . He is an enthusiastic team player and a blend of technical and functional skills.

Ivana Gadjanski Serbia

Ivana is co-founder and Chief Scientific Officer of Pubsonic, a stem cell research scientist with a PhD in Biology - Max Planck Institute & LMU, Germany; Fulbright fellow – Columbia University; TED Global Fellow 2012 and TEDMED Front Line Scholar 2013.

Vladan Petrovic Serbia

Vladan is co-founder and CTO of Pubsonic managing product development. As a senior web and mobile developer he has worked on projects from enterprise Portal/ERP solutions to E-Banking systems for Swiss banks. In last few years he was helping startups from Serbia, Japan, Australia and Germany to build their products.

5th class, July 2013 (14 participants)

Conno Christou UK

Conno is a graduate from Imperial College London where he studied Electrical and Electronic Engineering. He founded and managed 2 companies for the last 5 years. Passionate about front-end development and mobile marketing.

George Eracleous UK

George is a graduate from Imperial College London where he studied Information System Engineering and awarded as a top student in his class. He is an expert in machine learning and data mining. Also worked at Bloomberg and Duedil in the past.

Michal Mikulski Poland

CEO at EgzoTech Sp. z o.o., Owner at EgzoTech Michal Mikulski, Project Manager at Silesian University of Technology

Lukasz Korga Poland

EgzoTech and Owner of IPCON Patent and Legal Office.

Ali Rehan Pakistan

Ali, an MS graduate in Computer Science, Lahore (Pakistan) has been involved in multiple startups including chOpaal, the largest SMS based social network in Pakistan. He has also worked on a number of research and industrial projects in the field of Computer Vision. Most prominently, he has been a part of Computer Vision Lab, LUMS, where he worked on 3D reconstruction of deforming objects from a single video. At Eyedeus, he works as CEO and has been actively involved in the prototyping of new technologies.

Murtaza Taj Pakistan

Murtaza, Assistant Professor in Computer Science (CS) department at LUMS School of Science and Engineering has done his PhD in Computer Science and Electronics Engineering in 2009. His research interests are in Computer Vision, Pattern Recognition and Computer Graphics. He has produced 23 publications including 3 book chapters, 5 journals and 15 conference and workshop papers. He brings a combination of research experience in Digital Image Processing and proposal writing skills. At Eyedeus, he shares the role of prototyping key technologies and new product ideas.

Omar Gabr Egypt

Communications Engineering graduate in 2012. Founded EFS; an online store for soccer equipment in 2011. Omar is the Co-founder & CEO of Instabug managing the business, marketing, and operations.

Moataz Soliman Egypt

Computer Engineering graduate in 2012. Worked at Microsoft's HQ as a Software Testing Engineer. Moataz is the Co-founder & CTO of Instabug managing the development team and working on the iOS development

Noemie Prin France

Neomie is a UX and service designer. With an industrial design and mobile UX background, she specialized in collaborative systems with a thesis in Collective Intelligence. She use her skill in innovation process by service design, and is passionate about emerging technology.

Octave Bory-Bert France

Octave is CEO of Melusyn. He has business and media background. He has a passion for the filmi/Tv industry. He has worked for major IT and Telco companies, designing and selling B2B and B2C software. He is actively involved in several associations promoting entrepreneurship in Europe.

Steven Ellis South Africa

Steven is a web and back-end developer from Cape Town, South Africa. He has over 12 years' experience in business-application development for the web and mobile. He is an Honours graduate from the University of Cape Town, and has worked in London prior to settling in Cape Town. Steven's interests include music, films and travelling. MyDoorHandle is Steven's third startup venture.

Dylan Kohlstädt South Africa

Dylan Kohlstädt is a subject-matter expert on digital marketing, whose articles are regularly featured in entrepreneur and business magazines, TV and radio. She has an IMM Marketing Diploma and an MBA, and has over 20 years online marketing experience. In 2011 Dylan went on to establish a successful digital marketing agency, Shift ONE, that provides marketing services for entrepreneurs in Cape Town, South Africa.

Nissan Yaron Israel

CEO and cofounder of Inpris.Film maker and graduated studies at the Sam Spiegel film and television school in Jerusalem. Former chairman of ASLI - the Jerusalem Art Student Association. Former technological team leader at the army. Believe in creative approach in technology, the same as in art.

Salman Ul Haq Pakistan

Salman is a techpreneur, founder and CEO of TunaCode Inc. which delivers accelerated computing solutions in data security and video/image application verticals. He holds a degree in computer systems engineering. He started programming Java when he was 13 and hasn't looked back since then. Salman is passionate about how technology can solve some of the world's biggest problems. He also loves to trek.

4th class, February 2013 (14 participants)

Marcin Kowalski Poland

UXPin provides digital and analog design tools, that helps teams focus on User Experience and achieve great design in a collaborative way.

Marcin Treder Poland

UXPin provides digital and analog design tools, that helps teams focus on User Experience and achieve great design in a collaborative way.

Federico Treu Italy

Cubeyou is the "google analytics for Facebook Apps". A robust platform that gives businesses the ability to unlock and harness the power of facebook Apps data.

Eleanor Watson UK/The Netherlands

Poikos solves the issue of getting fast, easy and affordable body measurements into any system. The technology is licensed to impact research and commerce in various industries such as life science and consumers e-commerce.

Jakub Rož Czech Republic

mySchoolNotebook is a mobile application for taking school notes online. Students easily create notebooks where they can write their notes and then share them with their Facebook friends.

Jan Kuča Czech Republic

mySchoolNotebook is a mobile application for taking school notes online. Students easily create notebooks where they can write their notes and then share them with their Facebook friends.

Kim Løwert Denmark

Appstract is building a universal platform allowing users to access all their information on any screen/device at the click of a button. Users will have their own customized interface to access their productivity tools, social media and file storage services from any device.

Martin Ebbesen Denmark

Appstract is building a universal platform allowing users to access all their information on any screen/device at the click of a button. Users will have their own customized interface to access their productivity tools, social media and file storage services from any device.

Maxime Lamure France

PlanMeUp is a social activity discovery engine helping users explore and participate in real world activities based on their social profiles, location and their specific interests.

Marine Tranquard France

PlanMeUp is a social activity discovery engine helping users explore and participate in real world activities based on their social profiles, location and their specific interests.

Steffen Reitz Germany

Smarchive frees consumers' lives from paperwork - by aggregating both paper and digital documents in one single place, intelligently understanding all it's content and ticking off related tasks within seconds - such as paying invoices, comparing tariffs and cancelling contracts, all from your Tablet.

Rafah Alkhatib Saudi Arabia

3eesho is the largest online Arabic food nutrition social network for the Arabic speaking countries. With 5+ Million users, 3eesho aims to provide online and on the grounds events and activities to improve health awareness for obesity, diabetes and lack of activity problems in the youth and in the population in general.

Pinyi Zhou Canada

GameCall makes organizing sports easy. Whether you want to get friends together for a quick game of soccer, join a football league, or find another player for your hockey team, GameCall Social Sports connects you to the people who love being active as much as you do.

Nik Macintosh Canada

GameCall makes organizing sports easy. Whether you want to get friends together for a quick game of soccer, join a football league, or find another player for your hockey team, GameCall Social Sports connects you to the people who love being active as much as you do.

3rd class, August 2012 (12 participants)

Anne-Aymone Ferreira France

Advertory is a one-stop-shop platform that enables local businesses to increase revenue and to build customer loyalty online and on mobile.

Vincent Naigeon France

Advertory is a one-stop-shop platform that enables local businesses to increase revenue and to build customer loyalty online and on mobile.

Ernest Shakarov Russia

Viatun is a mobile application that saves up 80% of your mobile web expenses by data compression. Viatun is the fastest VPN on the market that helps people all over the world to have non restricted web access. Viatun works in all mobile and WiFi networks and is compatible with iOS, Android, Symbian and Windows Mobile OS based devices.

Edouard de La Jonquière France

Mention is a media monitoring application that allows anyone to be notified in real-time about any mention of a keyword on the web and social web, whether that be his name, his brand, his competitors or his industry.

Bertrand Besse France

The first professional social network. Composed of 40 fraternities, Muxi offers its users a platform where they can share their experience, ask questions, find colleagues and more generally connect with people doing the same job.

Sergey Moliavko Ukraine

Local social marketplace for emerging fashion labels operating on the Russian and Ukrainian markets.

Lars Tackmann Denmark

Solvr is a HTML5 based computer algebra system that runs on the web and tablets. Our vision is to make science interactive, collaborative and computable. We have not launched yet but have been in development for almost a year and recently demoed our app at Google's IO conference. Solvr is the first product on the market fully developed in Dart programming language.

Michael Eisler Austria

Wappwolf is focused on deconstructing the barriers of the Cloud. By connecting your Evernote, Facebook, Flickr, and other web services / apps to Dropbox. Drag & drop files into a predefined folder on Dropbox and automatically convert and sync to your favorite places.

Onno Faber the Netherlands

Ding Dong is a gesture-based messaging app that lowers communication barriers. In just one gesture you send both your location at a time, and the why of the message. It abstracts out the need to be specific in terms of text. Instead, it leverages the power of interpretation.

Leonardo Grijó Brazil

Startupolis is an initiative to boost the Brazilian startup ecosystem and entrepreneurs by building bridges with developed ecosystems, starting with Silicon Valley.

Sergiy Chekalsky Russia

Reactor is an online marketplace for clubs and DJs, operating on the Ukrainian and Russian markets.

Jurgen Koehler Germany

Designing User Experiences for the Internet of Things; Product designer; Hobby Pastry Chef.

Lisandro Bril Argentina

Non-profit organization that pioneered the concept of High-Impact Entrepreneurship in emerging markets. Its mission is to lead the global movement to catalyze long-term economic growth by selecting, mentoring, and accelerating the best High-Impact Entrepreneurs around the world.

ResumUP generates a step by step career path based on your professional aspirations, network and experience to help you achieve your career goals.

Specialized in language Decoder which is a technology that structures any text into a sequence of verb-related functions with parameters containing syntactic and semantic information. This Decoder gives you information about the roles that all words play in a given sentence.
